ISSUE.TITLE: Fatal error on OF list if Product field is not selected to be displayed
ISSUE.DESCRIPTION: ### Bug If you hide the product field in the OF list, there's a fatal error with message `Class 'Product' not found in htdocs/mrp/mo_list.php` ### Environment Version 18.0.3 ### Environment OS _No response_ ### Environment Web server _No response_ ### Environment PHP _No response_ ### Environment Database _No response_ ### Environment URL(s) _No response_ ### Expected and actual behavior _No response_ ### Steps to reproduce the behavior 1. Go to page `/mrp/mo_list.php` 2. Unselect the product field in the left selectfield menu ### Attached files _No response_
